name: loowoz
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w1, w0), wi(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: a2d(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), w1, w0, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w1, w0), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w1, wi(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w1, w0), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w1, wi(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(w1, wi(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w1, w0), wi(w1, w2)))

comment: An alternate for the Linearity Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz ~ loolin , due to Barbara Wozniakowska, _Reports on Mathematical Logic_ 10, 129-137 (1978). (Contributed by Mel L. O'Cat, 8-Aug-2004.)
